name: The Last Room (stuffedgravy)
description:
One stormy day, you find a book on your coffee table that you've never seen before. In hindsight, reading a mysterious book called "The End of the World" is kind of asking for it. Through unspecified backstory, you find out that all of reality outside of your studio apartment has been swallowed by the Void. As the cosmos is rebuilding from within this room, you must try to keep the Void at bay using your magical powers, recently acquired in the unspecified backstory.

CONTROLS:

Z - screen-clear bomb

X - close void portals. You must spam it for larger objects.

Space - pause/start game
